snippet: A British journalist accused Syrian rebels of trying to get him and his colleagues killed to draw condemnation against the government of President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: A British journalist accused Syrian rebels of trying to get him and his colleagues killed to draw condemnation against the government of President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: Reporter Accuses Syrian Rebels of Luring Him Into Death Trap
